name: Giant Family Reunion Photo-Off (GFRPO)
description:
The annual Giant Family Reunion Photo-Off is here! GFRPO is a competitive photo-taking game where 2 players compete to get the best selfies with the family before the reunion is over! Make sure to get close and get their face in the photo to get the most points to win! Pick and choose your filters and facial expressions to make each photo memorable as well.

Note: 2 controllers are required to play the game.

Controls:

  • Left Stick - Move
  • Right Stick - Spin
  • A Button - Take a Pic
  • X Button - Pick a Filter
  • Y Button - Change Facial Expression

GFRPO was made during the UOIT GDSOC (Game Dev Society) 2017 48 Hour Game Jam at the University of Ontario Institute of Technology by Moonwalk Studios members: Ravnik Jagpal, Daniel MacCormick, Jackson Rushing, Alain Sangalang and Wen Bo Yu.

Soundtrack: 

Zazie Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
